title: Great App and clothes !
text: I was very skeptical of ordering anything from Shein and waited  for almost 2 months before I finally placed the order and I‚Äôm so mad I waited. I wish I had been ordering my clothes and stuff from Shein a long time ago. The order came much faster than expected which was great because I‚Äôm in Florida . Then I opened the package and everything I ordered was beautiful and was very true to size and surprisingly good quality especially for the price and it looked just liked the picture. I had even bought a lace open back shirt that looked like you could buy it in a department store store for easily 4 times what I paid at Shein and the quality is just great . The App is very user friendly I had to make a return of one of the items because I ordered one size to small and the return process was very very easy and you can track it the whole time and then have the option to put it to a credit or your Shein Account. And Shein gives you points to buy stuff with as well . I would say as some advice read reviews first as some stuff runs  a little smaller that others . But definitely don‚Äôt hesitate ordering from Shein. It‚Äôs great !!

title: This company needs to improve.
text: affording things nowadays in stores is very uncommon, not everyone has alot of wealth and this app is perfect for those people including me. financially i have been able to afford a place to stay and food everyday and i like to explore my sense of style on a budget. I love the concept of cheaper things and who doesn't, we live in a society of money. i do have many concerns for this app, one of them being the packaging that they use. they use horrible non eco friendly packaging, and a ridiculous amount of plastic that it is honestly shocking, plus the audacity to make a #shiencares trend protecting wildlife animals, when their packaging is not, is ridiculous. yes its cheap, but at the success this app has im pretty sure they could spend some money making their packaging more eco friendly, therefore bringing in more costumers to buy on their site. If it wasn‚Äôt for the fast fashion and non sustainable packaging, everyone would shop here, they definitely could be making more. another concern i have is the fast fashion problem. Shien isnt ethical. they continue to steal designs from small brands, and we dont know how much money their workers are paid, but im not confident it‚Äôs enough. this company wont probably see this but make a change. for the good of the world and your workers.

title: Where I Do All My Shopping
text:
At first I was hesitant, thinking how could they offer such good prices if the stuff is any good? After my first order, I was no longer hesitant and I was hooked!  I don‚Äôt know how they do it, but the style of the cloths is so me, and for amazing prices & then amazing discounts on top of that!  I am a young 53, and granted some of the cloths are just too young for me, but there are a whole lot that are not!! The shoes are adorable & quality, the cloths are just so pretty, feminine & totally different than anything you‚Äôd find in a mall or department store.  Forget spending a fortune @ Victoria‚Äôs Secret-you don‚Äôt need to!  Shein has everything you could ever want at a fraction of the price.  I just realized recently that they have a ‚Äúhome‚Äù section too! Crazy!!   If I need a gift, this is where I go too.  Another fun fact is that almost every pic u see is what you get.  Even in color.  There has only been a couple times where it looked like the item was white & it ended up to be off white or ivory‚Ä¶ but other than that, they are spot on with their pics!! 
I am a customer for life.  Best online store EVER!!!!!!!!

title: overall a very good app, i do have some questions

title: I absolutely <3 SHEIN!!!
text:
SHEIN is my fav app but I have some things to say about it I really really really do love Shane but there‚Äôs some things that make me really mad about it. For instants I bought a little bear decorative item but I thought it would be a stuffed animal but turned out to be very very small and was hard and not like the material I thought it would be. title: LITERALLY THE BEST EVER!
text:
I was skeptical at first because the prices were so affordable and the styles so unique that I didn‚Äôt think this could possibly true. I love the app! I love the store! I love the customer service! And I love the merchandise! There are so many coupons and deals that I never feel like I missed out on anything if I didn‚Äôt purchase something that month.
I really love how there are honest customer reviews with pictures of everyday people (not just influencers or people with cosmetically enhanced bodies that I could prob never achieve). There is literally something for everyone!
Shipping was faster than expected. And customer service was great with my questions. I loved everything that I‚Äôve purchased so far so I don‚Äôt know how easy are hard returning and/or exchanging may be, but the process listed on my bill of sale seemed easy. Easy to read and understand, and I know from experience customer service is friendly if I have any questions. I feel as though they really got it right all around, and I‚Äôm so thankful for the amazing shopping experience that‚Äôs gonna make me a forever customer!

title: Affordable Fashion- if you know where to look!
text: SHEIN is a good affordable fashion company plus much more but I cannot stress enough that you have to read the details! Check sizes, (not just on clothing) it‚Äôs very important to actually read the exact measurements. Even though you may be a certain size normally you may need to size up or down, the measurements are different for each article of clothing. Look at the description for the materials, it will help you decide the quality and how the clothing will hold up. Read the reviews, look at the pics! It will help depict quality, sizing, and what it would really look like on you. If you follow these suggestions I think you will be pleasantly surprised at what you can find. I‚Äôve been shopping on SHEIN for over a year now and I made mistakes in the beginning and ended up with a pile of clothes I‚Äôll never wear but now SHEIN is the first place I check if I need something. It‚Äôs not just great for clothing, I‚Äôve purchased hair accessories, household necessities, home decor, and more. You can‚Äôt beat the prices and their shipping time has greatly improved!

title: If u don‚Äôt download this app, no matter your age, u are missing out!!!
text: Is there a word other than ‚Äúlove‚Äù that will sum up how I feel about this app/company?  Ummmm‚Ä¶NO! I actually LOVE it! SHEIN is a brand. (I believe it is pronounced ‚Äúshe-IN‚Äù, as in, ‚ÄúOoohhh Girl!  SHE IN style!‚Äù). I‚Äôm not really sure where to start with this review. This app is a whole experience. I look forward to getting on it every day. The sales are SOOO ridiculous you will get addicted. There are contest, videos, live shows, an ambassador program, product tester opportunities, games that donate to charitable causes while educating you, etc. and I‚Äôm all of these these things you earn points to be used toward future clothing purchases. They have the absolute best lingerie site for the price to quality ratio and the best stylish plus size dept I have ever seen. There is even a men‚Äôs, children's, pets and housewares department.  My favorite aspect is the daily flash sale. The price for these items are so low I feel like I‚Äôm stealing things.  They have different lanes within the brand so there is something for everyone. Don‚Äôt hesitate to download this one. You won‚Äôt regret it!

title: I LOVE THIS APP, SO CHEAP AND AMAZING!
text: this app is beyond amazing. i LOVE the pricing, and (for the most part), the shipping time as well. the one thing that irritates me is that, when i write a review of a product i bought from this app, the pictures don‚Äôt show when you go back and read it. even though i still get all my points, it would be extremely helpful to others if my pictures would show. i say this for everyone. i‚Äôve read reviews that mention something involving a picture, and it never shows. i‚Äôd like to know what they‚Äôre trying to show. it could help someone better understand a complication. i‚Äôve never had anything come broken or torn, so that‚Äôs fantastic! one last thing that i don‚Äôt really understand is that an alternative app to this is called ROMWE, and they both sell the same exact products. BUT, SHEIN sells them for a more expensive price, whereas ROMWE does not. same exact picture, same exact material, same exact product, just different price. other than that, this app is a 10/10 recommendation from me. if you‚Äôre looking for cheap, cute, stylish clothes, this is the app for you! (as well as the alternative app: ROMWE).

title: SHIEN IS THE BEST ü••
text: Shien offers cute, comfortable, and affordable clothing for all styles and genders! Are you a boy? Are you a girl? Are you a dog? It doesn‚Äôt matter because shien has clothes for everyone! SHIEN. RIGHT. NOW. YOU. WONT. REGRET. IT. IM TELLING YOU!! BUY SHIEN!

title: Great
text: My biggest problem is with not using stretchy fabrics for the curvy plus clothes. It‚Äôs VERY important for comfort. I keep telling them that they would sell a ton more jeans and shirts if they did because the clothes would fit a verity of people in just one size. I wish every plus size person would ask this of them, because maybe then they would change. I only gave it 4 stars because of some of the selling tactics. On some of the fake nails advertising photos they‚Äôre using a professionally manicured set of nails as the first selling photo. Many people don‚Äôt swipe any further, so that‚Äôs what they think they‚Äôre getting. But the actual set that‚Äôs delivered is not even close to the photo. The only other thing is, they hardly ever use an object in the advertising photos that show the actual size of the product. They give you measurements below the description, but the advertising photos are done in such a way that you think you don‚Äôt need to check. Even though not checking the measurements is on the buyer‚Äôs error. Other than that, I‚Äôve loved everything I‚Äôve gotten! Their customer service, is absolutely top notch.

title: So far
text:
So far I have been very pleased with Shein
Their products are of OK quality depending on what you get. Clothing wise they have been great. Their sizes vary and it‚Äôs hit and miss. But it‚Äôs good that they have free shipping with the first return of the package it came from. after you return the item like I‚Äôm sure you‚Äôve read in their instructions they charge you for return shipping for items in the same shipment. so just make sure you return everything from that delivery in one return so you don‚Äôt get charged. Also make sure you can return what you purchase. I just found out they have some things that are not returnable. My issue is I bought hats that were totally smashed upon packaging or whatever so they don‚Äôt look like expected And they say you cannot return hats. WHY???? there‚Äôs no reason you shouldn‚Äôt be able to return hats. This is the only thing I‚Äôve come across so far that is very upsetting. I only wanted one but didn‚Äôt know which one so I bought three and now I‚Äôm stuck with them plus they‚Äôre all defective, smashed.  I don‚Äôt understand why you cannot return defective hats that makes no sense. Besides this so far so good.

title: Looooooove Shein!
text: Shein makes really affordable, trendy pieces of clothing, accessories, and even home decor! I love how the app recommends similar styles to what I‚Äôm looking for. The app is intuitive and easy to use. Processing and shipping is fast‚ÄîI usually receive my items in approximately one week from China (I live in Florida)! I love that they reward clients for writing reviews because pictures on real bodies help me to figure out sizing. I took off one star because when you purchase items on sale and use a coupon for the non-sale items, it discounts off of the original price and sometimes you pay *more* than the item‚Äôs sale price. I also wish there was an easy way to contact customer service or a FAQ section because I‚Äôm always guessing my size (is an XL the same as OXL?). Shein makes it super easy to return the items that don‚Äôt fit which is why I don‚Äôt mind buying in bulk. Because the reviews are so helpful, I end up keeping 80% of my purchase! I‚Äôve received SO many compliments on the pieces I‚Äôve ordered. I don‚Äôt have a big discretionary income monthly and it‚Äôs nice to be able to treat yourself every now and then for a few bucks.

title: it‚Äôs an ok app
text:
Yes, Shein provides online shopping and has very stylish clothing that will meet anyone‚Äôs styling standards. Although, Shein clothing material isn‚Äôt the best in certain times. For example, I look at reviews sometimes and find out that that clothing is either too small, material is too thin, size wasn‚Äôt correct, clothing was shorter than shown, the list goes on! The clothing is sometimes isn‚Äôt all that bad tho and is very stylish. There is a reason behind this review though and let‚Äôs talk about it. Recently I participated in an event where you could earn  either 20 million points or 20 thousand points. Not too sure. I had won by sending links to other people and had to verify my email. I completed all that was needed for me to receive the points. Today is Saturday which is when they are supposed to give the points. Currently 7:20 pm  and I still haven‚Äôt received my points. If anyone else has won could anyone inform me if they have their points? Another thing is that I tried emailing shein with some questions because I‚Äôm pretty sure that they don‚Äôt think my email is verified. 

Edit: This app didn‚Äôt even give me the points it promised. It only gave 100 points to my friends and I (they won too). This app is pretty much a scam with cheap clothing. I definitely recommend to not get this app.

title: Shein is my first choice for clothes shopping
text: When I found Shein (showed to me by a friend). I was overjoyed to find it was totally affordable and had super cute clothing. I have already ordered off of Shein before. What I ordered was a cute black skirt, black paper bag pants and and white, black and mustard shirt. Also if you love clothes then your is excitement builds up after each day of waiting for them to show up. I remember first getting up and every single morning I‚Äôd go right to Shein to entertain myself. I found so many things I just loved, so on the fifth day of shopping I realized I‚Äôd already filled my cart. I just love this app. The clothes do actually come. Unlike some other online shopping places that just pretty much scam you. It also has a downloadable app that I find a little easier to access cause it‚Äôs right there. Clothes are good prices and good quality. I think it is much easier to shop at home and Shein has something for everyone you just have to check it out. Overall I absolutely, no doubt would give this app five stars and if I could way more than five. I just love Shein and hope you read my review.

title: SHEIN Fan
text: I love Shein; my closet is becoming a Shein closet from clothing attire, shoes, handbags, undergarments, all the way to cleaning supplies and kitchen gadgets!  I live on a budget and never had money for myself. After my priorities home/ utility bills, then my kids and their extra curricular activities and school expenses, at the end of the day, there was not enough for me to go shopping and get anything cute and fashionable. title: the app SHEIN

title: üö´ WARNING Shein has Hackers on their System üö´
text:
Omg I love Shein and use them & shop monthly. But my Internet has been acting weird & slow and seemed somebody put a virus on my system. I click on websites and keep getting warning from Hackers. But those are the Hackers.
Never trust Popup errors and call the number on your phone or email that‚Äôs sent to you.
Just recently Norton sent me an email that Shein was tracked for a security breach. Also Spectrum my Internet company keeps alerting me that Shein is a Secutity Threat or breaching my Internet. Someone in Shein is hacking or someone who works for the company itself is trying to get into our IP Address or Hack something from our systems. 
I‚Äôm at a loss because I love Shein and can‚Äôt believe they are not protecting their company. Please Shein have a better security system to protect your faithful customers. I probably won‚Äôt use them again. It shows at several times or three different times Shein was attempting to Hack or threat our personal internet or phone security.
The same thing happened with Haute Look website. A year later I got Norton saying Securiy was breached there. And they never contacted me or customers stating their was hacking in their system, please be careful with any internet company, App, or Out of Country Business since they don‚Äôt have same security measures!

title: HORRIBLE SERVICE!
text: This website is absolute TRASH. First let me begin by saying the measurements for the clothes are completely wrong, when you order something that should fit you it won‚Äôt. They will have you ship it back for free, but you won‚Äôt get your original shipping back in the refund. Secondly, the customer service is AWFUL. They do not give a crap about any inconveniences you experience due to their many screw ups. I ordered a robe and chemise set for my birthday, a 1X should have fit by the measurements. It didn‚Äôt. I sent it back and told them I wanted a refund. I ordered a size up because it was a just a tiny bit too small and the measurements said the 2XL was 2 inches bigger so the 2X should have fit perfect. Iwas wrong it was about .5 inches bigger. Measurements were definitely wrong. Barely a difference. They don‚Äôt care. Finally they receive my first return and instead of refunding my money they ship me a replacement? I chatted them and told them I requested a refund not a replacement and they said it was too late it had already been shipped I have to ship it back. So now I have to wait ANOTHER 2-3 weeks for my money because of their screw up. This website is a literal joke. Also, I left a honest review about the measurements of the robe and they hid it from the item. They only post reviews that benefit them. Total trash. DO NOT BUY FROM THIS PLACE!!!

title: Great variety and mostly Good prices
text:
My friend had been telling me to get seen for a while now, and I was skeptical because none of the reviews had been negative. My friend told me I should get it for the third time that week, and I told her to prove it was legit. then she showed me her previous orders, and told me the prices she got them for. I didn‚Äôt believe her at first, but I decided to give it a try anyway as soon as I got the app, I begin to search up things that I like. A bunch of things all in the style. I liked popped up after I searched a few words. I think the only downfall to the variety is that there aren‚Äôt very many movie/TV shows/anime clothes and  costumes, (you can always buy those on Amazon.)One of the things I was disappointed about was that the prices were more expensive then I had previously thought on clothes, (shortly after I realized you get a bunch of coupons) but then I thought, ‚Äúwhy not look at jewelry considering I don‚Äôt have a lot of it‚Äù I was SHOCKED at the prices of the jewelry items and accessories. All in all this app is a life saver! I really recommend and it‚Äôs very legit!

Have a nice day!

title: Very Satisfied Customer
text: It‚Äôs not just the app. It‚Äôs the fact that the app actually works, is user-friendly, and it‚Äôs offers an algorithm that doesn‚Äôt cost you too much time when you‚Äôre trying to filter through literally thousands of items. This app has a great filtering system for people like me who hate to spend too much time shopping (that‚Äôs why I shop online in the first place) and might need to be able to readily see if an item is a good fit for them‚Äîin so many ways. They always list the model‚Äôs measurements & size she‚Äôs wearing along with the size chart. The reviews also list customers measurements and size they purchased, some with photos so you can gauge how that might fit on you accordingly. I think it‚Äôs genius to offer the incentive of points for reviews, which motivate customers to write them which makes it easier for new customers. Their business model is simple yet amazing. I e also never paid for shipping; it‚Äôs always free. It would be nice if all clothing apps worked this way but US companies are simply too greedy. Good job SHEIN!

title: Whole heartedly love SHEIN!!
text: I have never appreciated a clothing store and brand as much as I do for SHEIN. I have so much more confidence because I have the opportunity to get a good deal on my clothes for my whole family and save my money for bills and not even worry about going over my budget. I have saved so much money and in the process receiving so much from SHEIN for less. You have no idea what joy you have brought me. I can get clothes and shoes and whatever else we need from one place and at a great price and great service and quality items at that. title: SHEIN Is My Go-To Shopping App ‚ú®
text:
SHEIN is my absolute first choice out of all the other shopping apps. They have a broad variety of clothing, shoes, jewelry, accessories, etc. The items that are sold on SHEIN are in excellent condition. The quality is fabulous. The prices are unbelievable. They are always running sales, and you can snag amazing outfits and accessories at an absolute STEAL! 

There are many ways to save on SHEIN. You can accumulate points by participating in outfit contests, joining in on their live-streams, participating in mini games, and creating your own ‚Äúfashion show‚Äù. There is also a Free Trial Center where you are able to submit applications for specific products for a chance to be selected to try out those products FOR FREE and leave reviews for them, and as you leave reviews for products, you rack up points. 

I highly recommend this app. If you are a bargain shopper, like I am, and you like to find amazing, high-quality products at a reasonable price, then SHEIN is for you! Not only is it a way to shop online, but it‚Äôs just a really fun experience as you participate in the different events they always have going on.

title: Love this App!
text:
When I saw the prices of the clothes, I was a bit hesitant at first because I thought it would be poor quality like Wish or Primark. To my relief, the quality of the clothes were even better than I expected! I have gotten so many compliments from people asking where I got my bags and clothes from. 

In addition to how much I love the items, the app itself is simply amazing! There is no other app out there that compares to this one. It is the EASIEST app to navigate through. There are genuine reviews from real people since reviews are incentivized by rewarding with points that can be used towards your next purchase. There are plenty of pictures and size charts to help you choose the right size. It‚Äôs easy to return items. The shipping usually takes just a week to 1 1/2 weeks after ordering. They sometimes do live video streams right on the app where they‚Äôll do Q&A‚Äôs, have models try on items, if you like the item you just tap it and brings you straight to the item to get more details and order it. I never do app reviews, but this one is my absolute favorite app.

title: I LOVE SHEIN
text: shein is the best app ever. i love using their app because their clothes are so nice and cheap. i think that the clothes on shein are nice quality, really comfortable, not itchy (clothes from other stores are either always itchy or uncomfortable.) and very cute! they always get here on time for me and they‚Äôre always packed in a box nicely üòä. shein i want to thank you and your team for giving people that are on a budget or don‚Äôt have much money some clothes!!!!!! i got my graduation dress from shein and it fitted so perfectly i got in like butter!!! it was also so comfy and it was so easy to zip up! title: Good shopping app
text: I really love shopping here. They have great deals and if you order anything more than 1 they will all get shipped together instead of waiting everyday for 1 thing to come at a time. I have ordered more than 30 things at a time and they get here all together. The clothes are nicely folded and put in good bags. I would buy lots of pants and jewelry and Everything has fit so far and good quality! You get free shipping after spending like $25 or so. And you get points for reviews. The only thing i dont like is that you can only refund one thing with free shipping and then if you wanna refund another thing then you gotta pay shipping and its all the way to china and the shipping cost will cost way more than the item. Also I hate it that when im ready to pay and put in my card number and realize I left it at work so I wanted to go back and do it another day, and I noticed that it deleted my shopping bag! I was ready to spend $100 here and they took everything off! Im not gonna go look for each item again

title: I‚Äôm hooked!
text: I honestly didn‚Äôt know what to expect when I tried this shopping site. I‚Äôll admit, I was skeptical at first, but I started out with a few purchases slowly, and for the price, how could I go wrong? I didn‚Äôt want to spend a lot on a new wardrobe since gaining weight, because I intend to lose it again, so SHEIN made sense. The clothes arrive fairly quickly, I haven‚Äôt had to return any items so far and I think I‚Äôve been shopping consistently with them 1- 3 times a week for the past year. Needless to say, I‚Äôve acquired more things than I originally intended. The quality is not a luxury brand, and that‚Äôs fine. It‚Äôs for everyday use at school. I love what I‚Äôve purchased and that‚Äôs what matters to me. If you want to be nit-picky, you could say that sometimes there are a few threads that just need to be trimmed off. But honestly, for the price, is that such a big deal? The quality has been great on the things I‚Äôve purchased. I‚Äôve gotten compliments on everything I‚Äôve purchased there and I always tell people where I bought my items. As students, affordable clothing is a must.

title: Def recommend! üíõ
text: Amazing app. Great quality clothes, dupes, you name it. Any insta model or bladder outfit u see can be found in SHEIN for cheap. It‚Äôs like ROMWE and ZAFUL but better. All of those sites combined but with free shipping and deals almost all the time. When it comes to sizes though it can be a little tricky. What I learned to do which always works for me is to look at pictures that other buyers posted for an item and compare my size to theirs to know what size to buy and It always comes correct. Do wish that they would fix up and be more accurate with their sizing but other then that it‚Äôs nice. If you check in fail on the app it‚Äôs gives you money. It seems like a long process till u get a good amount but it isn‚Äôt trust me. The most I get is 10 dollars to spend on my clothes like every month before I get too impatient to just spend it. I spent a certain amount of money on the app and now I‚Äôm the highest rank which allows me to have free shipping in every purchase. I didn‚Äôt even have to buy to much to spend too much. Just shopped normally for about a month or 2 and now i won‚Äôt ever have to pay the 3-4 dollars for shipping ever again!

title: My #1 Go-To For Everything
text: I absolutely loooove this site. They have literally everything from kitchen tools, wigs, clothes for everyone in the family including babies, toys, home decor, nails and even DIY crafts. Not only do they have so many categories of goods but the prices are unbeatable. You always get coupons, they always have events and you can rack up points that turn into money off your next order. It‚Äôs taken about a week or so for all my products to arrive and I love everything I‚Äôve gotten so far and trust me, it‚Äôs been a lot of big boxes filled to the brim. They have real reviews and people post pictures so you don‚Äôt have to rely solely on the advertised pics which we all know can sometimes be unreliable. But everything so far has been exactly as pictured. They have size charts which is very helpful. Just know things come from China so it takes time to sanitize as it‚Äôs traveling and some things are definitely made for slender bodies but luckily, they have a plus size sectionü§óI mean it, they have everything. You‚Äôll quickly be filling your wishlist.

title: 100% recommend. My first stop in online shopping
text: I have placed about 6 orders with SHEIN now. Just recently my order was about $200. Usually I spend up to $500. That shows you the amount of trust I have in their product. They always have an amazing,updated product selection. I love that every time I visit the app, there‚Äôs always new product selection. The clothing is great. It‚Äôs not the thickest, heavy material but I‚Äôm always very happy with what I receive. I have ordered many dresses, shirts, bikinis, skirts, wall paper, shelves, wall stickers, hair brushes, barrettes, jewelry, vases, flowers etc from them. There‚Äôs not much I haven‚Äôt ordered. The shipping time is about 2-3 weeks. But I know to expect that because it comes from overseas, plus we are in the middle of a pandemic so that slows transit time down a bit. I love that the product is affordable. And there‚Äôs always a coupon and points you can use towards your purchase. The app is very easy to navigate and recommends products based off other products you search for. I will order from SHEIN forever. I tell all my friends. I love it!!

title: ‚ù§Ô∏è Shein my new Fav!!!
text: I happened upon Shein when I was planning a trip to Puerto Rico back in May 2022. I saw an ad and a few of my relatives recommended it. I went to the website first before downloading the app. Upon my surprise the clothing was very beautiful online and it seemed to be of comparable quality to other online retailers. So I placed a order of several hundred dollars not knowing what I was going to receive. It took several weeks for my order to arrive. It was coming from overseas so I expected it to take some time. Each item came individually package in a Shein plastic bag. The material was good quality and some were soft to the touch. All my items were true to size so I didn't have to size up or down. I liked most of the items I purchased and others were a bit too much for me so I gave away to my younger nieces. They seemed to suit her age bracket. All in all I was satisfied with my order. I soon downloaded the app and made multiple purchase's of several hundred dollars each time. I am a Shein woman for life!!!

title: SHEIN review
text: I have been shopping with SHEIN for a long time now and honestly I love most of the things I purchase from them. My advice is the make sure you look at the reviews and any added pictures before you buy a product, since some things run small and large. The reason for the 3 stars and not 5 is because of their customer service. They got rid of their custom service chat with an actual person on their app and now it is just an automated chat which has been proven to be very unhelpful. I have had to Facebook message them to get ahold of someone and even then, it takes over a day just to get a response. I also advise y‚Äôall to pay for the expedited shipping because your package will take multiple weeks and the shipping information will not be updated as fast if you use their free shipping method. I placed an order on April 3, 2020 and I placed another one a few weeks later and paid for expedited shipping. I received the expedited shipping order within a week and a half, but I have yet to receive my original order that was placed on April 30. Just pay for expedited shipping and look at the clothing reviews and y‚Äôall will receive some awesome clothes for really cheap!

title: Age restriction
text: SHEIN has been amazing to me and my family for the past few months. It has very good products and clothes, and they have been very affordable. There‚Äôs just one thing that bothers me. SHEIN has added ‚ÄúSexual Wellness‚Äù products and there is no age restriction for it. I really think that none of that should show up if you don‚Äôt have an account registered. There are many kids that go to SHEIN to look for clothes, and I‚Äôm afraid that they might come across the products on accident. It can be very tempting to not want to know what that is about, kids can be very curious. I have a sister who uses SHEIN every day to look for clothes. I wouldn‚Äôt want for her to look at any of those products. The only thing that it asks you when click on that category is if your over the age of 18 and that‚Äôs it. It doesn‚Äôt make you confirm/ prove your real age. The worst part is that the category shows in the ‚ÄúBeauty‚Äù area. Please change it so that adults can only see it. That can either be by signing in with SHEIN or making it confirm your age, or just taking off those products from the app, which I doubt SHEIN will do. Please fix this problem.

title: Shein!!
text: I think Shein is the best online place I‚Äôve shopped at. Though it can be a little complicated finding just what you want, and the right sizes, I think it‚Äôs so reasonable! The prices are amazing, and not to mention the coupons!!! Also, there‚Äôs flash sales a lot of the time which is so nice. I got a sweater in a flash sale and it was over 50% off!! The clothes are good quality for the prices, and the experience on the app is amazing! I love getting such variation of things to choose from at the touch of a button. Shein really has helped me find some clothes I never would have found or tried in an actual store. I love how you can customize your information so it can automatically give you a size range to choose from. I love how easy it is to check out, and add things to your cart. I also really appreciate how you can see how much everything adds up to be in your cart, and that you can select and deselect to see that too. Overall, I definitely recommend this app. It‚Äôs just an amazing decision.

title: Love it
text:
Shein has a huge catalog of items, ranging from fashion apparel to home, beauty, accessories, shoes, pet, electronics, tools, office and more. You can find something for every occasion and style on Shein.
Shein offers free shipping and free returns on eligible orders, making it easy and convenient to shop online. You can also choose Afterpay to pay in 4 interest-free payments.
Shein has a user-friendly and intuitive app that allows you to browse by new arrivals, trends, category, best sellers and more. You can also use filters to narrow down your search and find what you want quickly.
Shein has a loyal and engaged community of customers who share their reviews, ratings, photos and videos of the products they bought. You can get honest feedback and inspiration from other Shein lovers and interact with them in real time.
Shein has frequent sales, discounts and promotions that let you save money and live in style. You can also get an extra 20% off on your first order and access exclusive deals and offers on the app.

title: Long-time customer finally driven away for good
text: Shein‚Äôs product quality, shipping times, and value vs. cost have steadily been getting worse and worse over the years.  Their customer service is absolutely terrible, and will ask your preference for things then intentionally do the exact opposite.  They have several items listed for sale that aren‚Äôt in stock (with no plans to restock) so they can force you to accept store credit instead of getting the items you actually purchased.  It‚Äôs also nearly impossible for me to find anything that fits my measurements.  I‚Äôm naturally long and lean, and Shein doesn‚Äôt carry my size at all - the smallest they carry is 2 sizes above in petites (which isn‚Äôt anywhere near long enough for my legs) or 3 sizes above in regular - and their clothing is already cut very large.  It‚Äôs especially frustrating with all the ‚ÄúShein for all‚Äù advertising making false claims about inclusivity.  Clearly, Shein is NOT for all, and doesn‚Äôt even TRY to be.  After dealing with their drastically declining quality, horrible customer service, and complete and utter lack of sizing options to fit me, Shein has finally driven me away for good, losing a long-time customer in the process.  I used to love Shein, but now it just disgusts me.

title: lead has been founding in their clothing
text: Personally I am a daily Shein shopper, however, I‚Äôm also a Medical student and upon some research about lead and it‚Äôs affects in the brain I found that Shein clothing was tested for lead and it came back positive via peer reviewed journal articles. This was not a surprise as it is made in China and when I was a kid I had a teacher tell us that China was using chemical warfare such as lead to poison our products to slowly kill people. That made complete sense to me as everything is mostly made in China. So please handle your Shein items with gloves or plastic bags wrapped around your hands and throw in the washer immediately without other clothing, wash them with a second rinse cycle and then do a rinse cycle in the machine after removing the clothing to remove residual lead. Lead is highly toxic and causes many diseases such as cancer and others. Buyers be careful! I still shop at Shein because they have the best outfits for the best prices. But that is the process I use to rid them of lead! Hope this helps all who shop at Shein.

title: Love SHEIN!!
text:
Although I haven‚Äôt been able to find my size in any of the clothes that I‚Äôve bought from Shein, they were really nice, and seemed to be a good quality clothing. Also I had no problem getting a shipping label for my return. I know you‚Äôre suppose to size up a little but I sized up 2 sizes from my US size 4, and I was still way off on the size. 
I‚Äôve bought other things from the app and I really like their lashes and makeup. They have really cute indoor and outdoor decor.
My Daughter absolutely loves Shein and the clothes as well as the accessories she‚Äôs purchased were all things she could use. 
I gave them a 5 star review because they have a huge variety of items for a very affordable price, it may not always be exactly what you think it should be, but for the price it‚Äôs definitely worth a try‚Ä¶ and if it‚Äôs not what you thought it would be, you can ship it back to them for an exchange or a refund. 
I‚Äôd love to be able to order clothes for myself, bc I absolutely LOVE their clothes! üòç so adorable!

title: Still Testing The Waters
text: I gave the review 4 stars for now because there still are a few things I want to check out before giving my final rating. I placed an order weeks ago .. Im a plus size woman so this sites usually don‚Äôt have items that fit or favor plus size body types so I purchased some things I felt like would fit. 2 dresses, a two piece short set and another item that slipped my mind. One of the dresses was too small and the top to the short set didn‚Äôt fit but overall, I was still pleased because you get what you pay for and because I lived the other items so much that I didn‚Äôt care about the couple of bucks I spent on the items that can‚Äôt fit.. the shorts on the short set fit so I decided to use it as my running errand outfit and pair it with a T-shirt lol. The other dress that couldn‚Äôt fit is still in my closet. I love it still and I‚Äôm losing weight so I‚Äôm keeping it. I plan to order again and this time I‚Äôm going to buy a few shirts for work and some kind pants. This way I can give a compete rating on how everything fits from them. Until then, they‚Äôre are exceeding expectations already.

title: They hack into your phone!!!
text: When I downloaded this app a few months ago I was extremely excited because the clothes were very cheap and super cute! I‚Äôve also ordered many things off of this app and everything has been fairly good quality and overall I‚Äôve been very happy about the clothes, accessories, etc. Then I saw a video on social media where this girl was talking about how someone had logged into her email, instagram, etc. she checked her email and the login had come from Shein. I checked the comments of this video and many people said they were experiencing the same thing. I was very surprised so I went to go check my email and saw that someone had tried to login to my email/other socials so I deleted this app. If you look up Shein you will see multiple articles on this subject. If you have Shein, Romwe, or Zaful, delete them!! They are all run under the same company. I deleted all 3 apps and I haven‚Äôt gotten a single hack alert in weeks. My sister also got an alert about these clothing apps then deleted them after and she also hasn‚Äôt gotten the alerts sent to her account. If you need fairly cheap stuff look on apps like Depop and AliExpress, they have cute cheap stuff that doesn‚Äôt try to scam you.

title: Dumbfounded!
text: I‚Äôm a young lady in the Marine Corps with a newborn, two puppies, and a busy life, so being able to pop in and out of the app to keep working on putting my cart together is a must! When I like an item but not enough to purchase it, Shein shows an outstanding ‚Äúitems like this‚Äù list underneath the original listing. This feature provides variety for a picky person like me. I especially appreciate the reviews section. Each item is modeled on a wide variety of body styles of women, with body measurements shown. I‚Äôm able to easily tell what size would fit on me best which is crucial in online shopping. This is my first attempt at not shopping in person, as the drastically proportioned person I am, and I am dumbfounded. The consistent updates on the package arrival through the app is wonderful too. It tweaks delivery time all the way up until the package shows up, so I know when to take it inside to avoid getting stolen, or so that I can schedule being home when it arrives. Five stars.
